thread.title: SNL Finally Takes on Ivanka Trump With the Help of Scarlett Johansson
thread.title_full: SNL Finally Takes on Ivanka Trump With the Help of Scarlett Johansson

title: SNL Finally Takes on Ivanka Trump With the Help of Scarlett Johansson
text: Tweet Share Scarlett Johansson takes on Ivanka Trump in a spoof fragrance on in newest episode of Saturday Night Life (Photo: NBC) More While spoofs of President Donald Trump have been a consistent presence on the latest season of SNL (thanks to Alec Baldwin’s exuberant participation), the weekly comedy show has largely steered clear of taking on the country’s new First Daughter. Until Scarlett Johansson came along. In the megastar’s fifth appearance on SNL, she channel’s Donald J. Trump’s eldest child with a fragrance spoof, entitled “Complicit.” The fake advert takes a stab at Ivanka Trump, describing her tongue-in-cheekily as a “feminist, an advocate, a champion for women, but … like … how?!” Read more from Yahoo Style + Beauty:
